https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rPm1V8EjU3XKDxlMYkK6lzgGqT.jpg Two lonely people at opposite chapters of life accidentally meet on a busy summer day in a Cairo taxi. Frail old Shawky and bubbly young Doaa are both caught up in their busy routines as their race through the city evolves into a journey of self-discovery that reconnects them to life. Dry Hot Summers
